name: Heavenly Blue Collection Sapphire
description:
So yeah, this is my first game jam. I decided to start doing those to get better at making games, and honestly, I really really like the engine.

This is for the 2 minute horror jam.

I made the programming, pixel art, and music.

Music: Audacity and Garageband iOS app

Art: Photoshop and Blender
